name: Painkiller: Hell & Damnation - City Critters
description:
Painkiller: Hell & Damnation - City Critters is an action-shooter game developed by The Farm 51. It came out on 13-12-2013. It was published by Nordic Games Publishing. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Painkiller: Hell & Damnation - City Critters is available on PC.
